article.Heading: Budget 2017: What's the call today for market set-up?
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18's Anuj Singhal is assessing the trade set-up or the market set-up for today on the occasion of the Budget 2017.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18's Anuj Singhal is assessing the trade set-up or the market set-up for  today on the occasion of the Budget 2017.

He also gives key issues to focus on Budget.

Watch accompanying video for more details.
